definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: The image is out of focus.
You had better refocus your camera on those boats.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把照相机的焦距调整一下对准那些小船。

sentences.english: This is a long focus lens.
sentences.chinese: 焦距长底随透镜的厚度而变化。

sentences.english: You cannot take a good photograph unless the object is in focus.
sentences.chinese: 只有对准焦距才可以拍出好照片。

sentences.english: A near-sighted eye has a shorter focus than a normal eye.
sentences.chinese: 近视眼的焦距比正常眼睛的要短。

sentences.english: He racked his camera and pressed down the shutter release.
sentences.chinese: 他将照相机的焦距调好，然后按下快门。

sentences.english: His lens would freeze over and became impossible to focus.
sentences.chinese: 他的镜头会被冻住，然后就没法调节焦距了。

sentences.english: An image processing system computes the size of the reticle image and the focal length.
sentences.chinese: 图像处理系统将计算十字线的像的尺寸和焦距。

sentences.english: At present, some difficulties are encountered in measurement of long focal length of lens.
sentences.chinese: 目前，透镜长焦距的有效测量还存在一些难题。

sentences.english: This is the ratio of the focal length of the telescope to its aperture.
sentences.chinese: 这是指望远镜的焦距与其孔径的比值。

sentences.english: Before you take photos, please adjust the focus of your camera.
sentences.chinese: 在照相之前请调准照相机的焦距。

sentences.english: He took out the camera and brought it into focus.
sentences.chinese: 他拿出相机并调准了焦距。

sentences.english: In this paper, a measuring method of convex lens foci in collimator is given.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种测量平行光管内凸透镜焦距的测量方法。

sentences.english: She set the camera for a long-distance shot.
sentences.chinese: 她调好相机焦距，准备拍摄远处的目标。

sentences.english: A near-sighted eye has a shorter focus than a normal eye.
sentences.chinese: 近视眼比正常的眼睛有较短的焦距。

sentences.english: Finally the design of a refracting-reflecting objective with long focal length is represented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，介绍了折反射式长焦距物镜的设计。

definition: camera lens/camera shot (in a movie etc)/scene
rectangular frame used to view a scene (made out of cardboard etc, or formed by the thumbs and forefingers)/viewfinder/viewing frame
